name: Montreal-seasoned Strip Steak
description: Marinating makes everything better! Infuse a great cut with bold flavour in as little as 30 minutes.
preparation:
1. Add first 3 ingredients to a sealable, food-safe plastic bag. Add steak, seal bag and marinate in refrigerator.
  2. Preheat grill, or grill pan, to medium-high heat.
  3. Remove steak and discard marinade. Grill for 16–20 minutes, turning occasionally, or until cooked to taste.
  4. Allow steak to rest for a minimum of 10 minutes. Slice against the grain and serve.
